complaint.description: Ordered my 5G router. Got the router from the friendly Courier that took my RICA details. Got sms that sim is RICAd and that I can plug it into the modem. Plugged the sim into the modem. The modem does not see or recognise the sim. Phone the worst call centre that can’t even speak english properly. Got told to wait 24 hours. 24 hours later still doesn’t work. Don’t buy this stuff. Rain so what now….

meta.review_content: Ordered my 5G router. Got the router from the friendly Courier that took my RICA details. Got sms that sim is RICAd and that I can plug it into the modem. Got told to wait 24 hours. 24 hours later still doesn’t work. Don’t buy this stuff. Rain so what now….
